blog.name: queenri0t
blog.title: Probably Writting Or Not
blog.description:
Welcome to our cult

———

Banner art belongs to @Huffie-Artist

Rules: Don’t be a Bitch // Masterlist // I write alot of Kirishima Beware!!! // My Insta: @queenri0t

body:
Red Rockstar

Song: Bruno Mars - Long Distance

-

He’s been gone for awhile. Out in the world showing his talents. Of course you couldn’t say anything. No, you wanted him to pursue his dreams and that’s what he was doing. However you didn’t suspect it to hurt this bad.

The nights you spend alone without him. The days you spend waiting for him to call and yet you were left with nothing. Though when you saw him on tv you couldn’t help but smile; he was happy with his fans. So why was it that you felt at fault for this?

Maybe you were the one being too clingy? Maybe you should’ve never admitted your feelings to him before his big concert. The one thing that made him go so viral and big.

‘There’s only so many songs, that I can sing to pass the time

And I’m running out of things to do, to get you off my mind (Oh ohh)’

Kirishima sighed another concert done and over with and he couldn’t be happier with that. He had to admit this tour was kicking his ass and he’s doesn’t know if he could sing another song from the heart anymore. Not with all these screaming fans of his and the backstage parties.

At first he wouldn’t mind it in fact he enjoyed them for awhile but day after day of constant drinking then singing then traveling. Kirishima wanted to throw up and head home.

“Hey Kirishima my bro we’re all going to Ultra Plus for some drinks get your ass ready!!!”

Kirishima groaned and placed his guitar down before flopping down on the leather sofa. He was going absolutely insane with this and if he had to hear his manger say that they’re “taking a detour” one more time he swears he might actually commit murder.

Placing his elbows on his knees he sighed and took the cold beer on the table that was placed by someone. Taking a swing of the alcohol he sighed and dropped his head. He missed you so much that it hurt for him

‘This long distance is killing me

It’s so hard, it’s so hard

Where we are, where we are

You’re so far, this long distance is killing me’

You whimpered at the cold bed you were laying on. The smell of him didn’t provide as much comfort anymore. You need his warm no, better yet you need him home. You needed him to whisper sweet nothings in your ear. You needed him to hold you and make you forget all the stress from the world. You needed him to take you and make love to you in every part he could. You just needed him.

Rolling over you faced the empty bed that was called his and you grabbed his pillow and inhaled the scent one more time. It wasn’t as comforting but it was still there to remind you that you were his. Then you saw it.

It was an old picture of you both sharing a kiss at one of his concerts. It was the first time he announced you as his girlfriend to the public. You loved it and you heard the crowd scream and cheer for their favorite redhead singer. You never forgot that day.

‘All I have is this picture in a frame

That I hold close, to see your face again (Ohh!)’

“Hey man great concert!!”

“Omg it’s him Red Riot.”

“Hey looks here the big man made it!!”

Kirishima felt a hand smack his back hard and he jumped turning his head to meet the yellow hair bass player.

“H-hey man.” Kirishima said and the yellow hair laughed with a beer in his hand. He looked like he was about to be shit faced drunk.

“Man we rooooocked it tonight!!! I never heard so many girls scream my name until now.” He sighed and Kirishima laughed and kaminari smiled before he gasped and stood up but with his drunken state he almost fell over and Kirishima was there to catch him.

“Blasty!!!!! Heeeyyy man check out those ladies?” He slurred and the spiked hair man rolled his eyes.

“Yeah and I told them to fuck off.” He said making kaminari whined.

“Man you’re never gonna get a lady if you keep pushing them away!!” He said then patted Kirishima’s shoulder “Like this man!!! He’s got one hottie under his belt!!” He howled and Kirishima growled.

“Haha yeah Y/n is definitely something…” he said lowly and looked down. The two seemed to notice the behavior of the red head. The ash blonde sighed

“It’s her isn’t it?”

Kirishima sighed and nodded “…yeah. I just I can’t keep doing this to her. I love you guy and all but I need to be with her.” He said and Bakugo smirked “So you think it’s time?” He said and Kirishima stopped a vision came to his eyes and he saw you. Your beautiful smile and your hair oh how he loved your hair. He saw you running up to him and him catching you but what caught his attention was that you weren’t alone, no you had two kids following you that looked so much like you. They looked beautiful and he caugh eye of a boy with his teeth.

Kirishima smiled and nodded

“Yeah it’s time.”

‘Can you hear me cryin’? (Ohhh!)

Can you hear me cryin’? (Ohhh!)…

Can you hear me cryin’? (Ohhhhh!)’

“And just in Red Riot is back for another interview and what he says is shocking to everyone!!!’

You sat there watching the tv intensely. Bakugo texted you saying to turn on the t.v. and you tried to ask him what’s wrong but he just said to turn on the tv and watch.

So here you were. Watching and listening as your boyfriend made it up to the small stage used for questioning.

As you saw him enter the room you saw all the reporters and photographers stand up and ask him questions, too many for you to comprehend what they were saying.

Finally it was quite and you saw Kirishima raise his hands and everything was stop to a halt.

“I…” He spoke and you held your breath “I’m sorry to say this but the tour too the UK will be canceled.” You gasped so did everyone else before you heard them break out into questions and shouting. Kirishima kept his glasses on and he pointed to a random reporter in the room and the crowd went silent waiting to get an answer from him.

“Mr. Riot why are you canceling the biggest part of your career? Could you be tired of your band?”

Kirishima sighed and bit his lip and you did the same holding your arms close to yourself.

“No I’m not tired of the band. They’re my family, but recently I’ve been missing a bigger part of my family.” He spoke and the reporters burst out into question again and he picked another.

“Mr. Riot why cancel your entire big tour around the world for this single family member?”

You gasp, how could he do something like this? He worked so hard for this tour, but you wanted to know who he was talking about. Maybe his mother was sick, you knew she had poor health but she was a strong fighter. So who was he coming home too?

‘This long distance is killing me

I wish that you were here with me

But we’re stuck where we are

And it’s so hard, you’re so fary’

Kirishima clenched his jaw. The question we’re getting too much.

“Mr. Riot who is this family?”

“Are they forcing you!!”

“How could you leave your career for that one person!?!?”

“Who are they!!”

“You’re being blackmailed by your girlfriend aren’t you!?!”

Blackmail? Blackmail!! Good god no that was far from the truth. Now everyone is gonna think otherwise.

“No.” He said firmly and he took off his glasses showing the furry in his eye, how dare they! How dare they make you the villain of something you supported as much as he does.

“The reason why I’m canceling is because I’m planning on making the biggest decision of my life. So big that no song or your can come even close to it.” He said firmly and everyone waited for his answer. Kirishima sighed and looked at the reporters

“I love my career I really do, but…..I’ve had a vision.” He said and looked down “A vision of my future and where I want to be.”

Everyone bursted out again, asking him to spill the vision and tell them everything. Kirishima bit his lip he was more nervous than ever. He raised his hand and silence was spread through the room.

“M-My vision is with my rock Y/n. I saw it clear as day. I want to be by her side as much as she was with mine. So I’m asking this question now and only to her.” He spoke and he walked down the stage and went in front of a camera.

“Y/n god you been there for me so many times and I Love you everyday we been on our big tour but I’m done. I’m tired of staying away from you and I want you here with me. Not as boyfriend and girlfriend but….a-as husband and wife.” He said and he heard most of the reporters gasped and he pulled out the ring he kept in his pockets.

He always had it with him waiting to get the balls to ask you the question and now was the time.

“Y/n will you marry me?”

It was an old picture of you both sharing a kiss at one of his concerts. It was the first time he announced you as his girlfriend to the public. You loved it and you heard the crowd scream and cheer for their favorite redhead singer. You never forgot that day.

‘All I have is this picture in a frame

That I hold close, to see your face again (Ohh!)’

“Hey man great concert!!”

“Omg it’s him Red Riot.”

“Hey looks here the big man made it!!”

Kirishima felt a hand smack his back hard and he jumped turning his head to meet the yellow hair bass player.

“H-hey man.” Kirishima said and the yellow hair laughed with a beer in his hand. He looked like he was about to be shit faced drunk.

“Man we rooooocked it tonight!!! I never heard so many girls scream my name until now.” He sighed and Kirishima laughed and kaminari smiled before he gasped and stood up but with his drunken state he almost fell over and Kirishima was there to catch him.

“Blasty!!!!! Heeeyyy man check out those ladies?” He slurred and the spiked hair man rolled his eyes.

“Yeah and I told them to fuck off.” He said making kaminari whined.

“Man you’re never gonna get a lady if you keep pushing them away!!” He said then patted Kirishima’s shoulder “Like this man!!! He’s got one hottie under his belt!!” He howled and Kirishima growled.

“Haha yeah Y/n is definitely something…” he said lowly and looked down. The two seemed to notice the behavior of the red head. The ash blonde sighed

“It’s her isn’t it?”

Kirishima sighed and nodded “…yeah. I just I can’t keep doing this to her. I love you guy and all but I need to be with her.” He said and Bakugo smirked “So you think it’s time?” He said and Kirishima stopped a vision came to his eyes and he saw you. Your beautiful smile and your hair oh how he loved your hair. He saw you running up to him and him catching you but what caught his attention was that you weren’t alone, no you had two kids following you that looked so much like you. They looked beautiful and he caugh eye of a boy with his teeth.

Kirishima smiled and nodded

“Yeah it’s time.”

‘Can you hear me cryin’? (Ohhh!)

Can you hear me cryin’? (Ohhh!)…

Can you hear me cryin’? (Ohhhhh!)’

“And just in Red Riot is back for another interview and what he says is shocking to everyone!!!’

You sat there watching the tv intensely. Bakugo texted you saying to turn on the t.v. and you tried to ask him what’s wrong but he just said to turn on the tv and watch.

So here you were. Watching and listening as your boyfriend made it up to the small stage used for questioning.

As you saw him enter the room you saw all the reporters and photographers stand up and ask him questions, too many for you to comprehend what they were saying.

Finally it was quite and you saw Kirishima raise his hands and everything was stop to a halt.

“I…” He spoke and you held your breath “I’m sorry to say this but the tour too the UK will be canceled.” You gasped so did everyone else before you heard them break out into questions and shouting. Kirishima kept his glasses on and he pointed to a random reporter in the room and the crowd went silent waiting to get an answer from him.

“Mr. Riot why are you canceling the biggest part of your career? Could you be tired of your band?”

Kirishima sighed and bit his lip and you did the same holding your arms close to yourself.

“No I’m not tired of the band. They’re my family, but recently I’ve been missing a bigger part of my family.” He spoke and the reporters burst out into question again and he picked another.

“Mr. Riot why cancel your entire big tour around the world for this single family member?”

You gasp, how could he do something like this? He worked so hard for this tour, but you wanted to know who he was talking about. Maybe his mother was sick, you knew she had poor health but she was a strong fighter. So who was he coming home too?

‘This long distance is killing me

I wish that you were here with me

But we’re stuck where we are

And it’s so hard, you’re so fary’

Kirishima clenched his jaw. The question we’re getting too much.

“Mr. Riot who is this family?”

“Are they forcing you!!”

“How could you leave your career for that one person!?!?”

“Who are they!!”

“You’re being blackmailed by your girlfriend aren’t you!?!”

Blackmail? Blackmail!! Good god no that was far from the truth. Now everyone is gonna think otherwise.

“No.” He said firmly and he took off his glasses showing the furry in his eye, how dare they! How dare they make you the villain of something you supported as much as he does.

“The reason why I’m canceling is because I’m planning on making the biggest decision of my life. So big that no song or your can come even close to it.” He said firmly and everyone waited for his answer. Kirishima sighed and looked at the reporters

“I love my career I really do, but…..I’ve had a vision.” He said and looked down “A vision of my future and where I want to be.”

Everyone bursted out again, asking him to spill the vision and tell them everything. Kirishima bit his lip he was more nervous than ever. He raised his hand and silence was spread through the room.

“M-My vision is with my rock Y/n. I saw it clear as day. I want to be by her side as much as she was with mine. So I’m asking this question now and only to her.” He spoke and he walked down the stage and went in front of a camera.

“Y/n god you been there for me so many times and I Love you everyday we been on our big tour but I’m done. I’m tired of staying away from you and I want you here with me. Not as boyfriend and girlfriend but….a-as husband and wife.” He said and he heard most of the reporters gasped and he pulled out the ring he kept in his pockets.

He always had it with him waiting to get the balls to ask you the question and now was the time.

“Y/n will you marry me?”
trail.content:
Red Rockstar

Song: Bruno Mars - Long Distance

-

He’s been gone for awhile. Out in the world showing his talents. Of course you couldn’t say anything. No, you wanted him to pursue his dreams and that’s what he was doing. However you didn’t suspect it to hurt this bad.

The nights you spend alone without him. The days you spend waiting for him to call and yet you were left with nothing. Though when you saw him on tv you couldn’t help but smile; he was happy with his fans. So why was it that you felt at fault for this?

Maybe you were the one being too clingy? Maybe you should’ve never admitted your feelings to him before his big concert. The one thing that made him go so viral and big.

‘There’s only so many songs, that I can sing to pass the time

And I’m running out of things to do, to get you off my mind (Oh ohh)’

Kirishima sighed another concert done and over with and he couldn’t be happier with that. He had to admit this tour was kicking his ass and he’s doesn’t know if he could sing another song from the heart anymore. Not with all these screaming fans of his and the backstage parties.

At first he wouldn’t mind it in fact he enjoyed them for awhile but day after day of constant drinking then singing then traveling. Kirishima wanted to throw up and head home.

“Hey Kirishima my bro we’re all going to Ultra Plus for some drinks get your ass ready!!!”

Kirishima groaned and placed his guitar down before flopping down on the leather sofa. He was going absolutely insane with this and if he had to hear his manger say that they’re “taking a detour” one more time he swears he might actually commit murder.

Placing his elbows on his knees he sighed and took the cold beer on the table that was placed by someone. Taking a swing of the alcohol he sighed and dropped his head. He missed you so much that it hurt for him

‘This long distance is killing me

It’s so hard, it’s so hard

Where we are, where we are

You’re so far, this long distance is killing me’

You whimpered at the cold bed you were laying on. The smell of him didn’t provide as much comfort anymore. You need his warm no, better yet you need him home. title: Best of tags #07
body:
A compilation of my favorite reactions to this blog.

@samqui801 on Deku’s sleeptalking: (Link)

#sir nicolas calzones the water.must be taste. do you taste the water. taste like shit did you shit in my water sir nicolas calzones#i remember a friend when hes sleep deprived he start muttering his dream#one of my favorites#bc he sleep in metodologia class hw said#i laughed so hard that the teacher kick me.out of the class and i woke up.my friend

I feel like I aged 20 years reading this.

@talk-quirky-to-me on Nezu’s subpar plans : (Link)

#nezu this is literally your quirk how do you frick up so bad

The smartest mouse in the world is still a mouse, I guess.

@mrhydandsick on Todoroki’s poem: (Link)

Whoever wrote this is a god 😂

I would be lying if I said I never a strange compulsion to send a pestilence upon the good city of Thebes.

@gentlemaninred on Iida fleeing to South America: (Link)

Why does every petty crook want to move here, dammit?!

The real estate market being as corrupt as it is, it makes sense that hiding places for criminals follow the same rules of attractivity as any other location. One popular criminal moves there and soon every other thief flocks the same way.

@cryallaboutit on the great Kirideku/Todobaku deception: (Link)

Weres the rest of the fic op

I don’t have time to write fanfictions anymore, this blog is basically my methadone. Furthermore English is not my first language. If anybody wants to expand on the ficlets I post, be my guest. I’ll happily reblog and credit your work.

title: Get yourself a man who can do both, featuring:
body:
Kohei Horikoshi, creator of “My Hero Academia”

A small creature. He cannot help this. I must protect him (possibly by knitting him a sweater). We can’t let him catch a cold!

An elegant, contrasted look. The goggles say “I’m gonna poison the city’s water supply” but the shirt says “I want to impress your father”. Truly a fashion icon.

Name: Rebecca Shacklebolt

Gender: Female

Age: 16

Occupation: Hero-in-Training, Student

Height: 6ft 

Weight: 82kg 

Hair Color: Silver

Hair Type: Messy Medium Length 

Eye Color: Icy Grey 

Skin Color: Pale 

Nationality: English

School: Beowulf’s Academy for Gifted Youths 

Year: 1st

Distinguishing Features: 

  • Natural Piercings; She has three metallic rings on each earlobe, and one on her septum

Hero/Villain Profile

Hero/villain Name: Platinum

Costume: Rebecca’s costume mimics classic comic book superheroes in design, being primarily composed of a platinum, long sleeved leotard with the sleeves ending just below the elbow. Below her leotard and covering her thighs are tight black shorts that end above the knee. She sports short white boots, with two metal rings on each ankle.

In order to protect her head, Rebecca wears a metal head guard, wrapping around her forehead and jaw - similar to a boxing guard - alongside a blue visor that covers her nose and eyes.

She has a dark grey lock emblazoned on her chest, and two gold disks by her collar which fasten a slate-grey hooded cape to her costume.

Quirk: Chains

Weapons: None

Gadgets/Tech: None

Social

Likes: Jewellery, swords, comic books, UK Grime, the Pro Hero Real Steel, and Fighting Games

Dislikes: Coffee, rain, and poor spelling and grammar

Habits: Cracking knuckles, playing with jewellery, stickler for rules 

Fears: Change she cannot control, the unknown, and deep holes

Family:

  • Myrtle Shacklebolt: Grandmother
  • Lincoln Shacklebolt: Father
  • Silver Shacklebolt: Mother
  • Ebenezer Shacklebolt: Eldest Brother
  • Mason Shacklebolt: Older Brother
  • Jade Shacklebolt: Older Sister

Romantic Interests:

  • “King” Adeyemi
  • Daniel Thomlinson

Allies:

  • Nhu Nguyen
  • “Grim” Muzrab 
  • Ash Xieye Lingyu
  • Minerva Hellason

Rivals:

  • Daniel Thomlinson

Enemies:

  • The Wild Hunt

Physical Weaknesses: Heat, magnets, and concentrated force can all counteract her quirk.

Mental/Emotional Weaknesses: Rebecca heavily relies on detailed planning, so any situation where a plan does not go successfully leaves Rebecca nearly useless.

Quirk

Name of your quirk: Chains

Description: Chains provides Rebecca with the ability to produce chains from her body and manipulate them like an extension of her own limbs. The chains only emerge from her skin, and can extend to a maximum of 20ft in length.

Strength: Due to the simple nature of her quirk, Rebecca’s quirk is capable of numerous utility. 

The primary use of her ability is binding and restraining enemies, manipulating her chains to wrap around her foes and prevent them from moving and acting. Similarly, for victims she can use her chains to capture and carry them to safety. 

The chains can also regularly extend out 15ft, granting Rebecca a wide reach to grab at foes. The speed that they can extend out is equal to the speed at which they can retract back into her body. The combination of extending out her chains and retracting them into her body allow her to either drag or pull objects away or towards her, or grapple and swing to and from points.

Her quirks offensive uses can be divided into two She can use the chains in mid-to-long range combat, either swinging her chains and lashing at opponents, or quickly launching out chains to jab at her enemies. 

Rebecca can wrap the chains around her body to enhance her physical abilities. Wrapping the chains around her arms and legs enhances the power of her strikes. Additionally, by enveloping her entire body in chains, Rebecca essentially armours her body at the expense of her mobility.

Weaknesses: Although Rebecca’s chains are notably strong, they are still made of steel, and so keep the weaknesses of steel and iron. Strong force can easily shatter her chains, nullifying her quirk. For example, a physically stronger villain could break out of her chains or grab her chains and throw her around.

Additionally, as steel is magnetic, whenever her quirk is active, Rebecca becomes magnetic. As a result, she can easily be rendered immobile by either a strong magnet or a magnetic quirk user.

Finally, her quirks third main weakness is heat. High levels of heat or high intensity flames can melt her chains.

What age did you obtain it: 5

How did you obtain it (what was happening at the time): When Lincoln Shacklebolt first told Rebecca that she had to visit a doctor to check why her quirk hadn’t developed yet, Rebecca was distraught. So, as she was being pulled out of her home mid-tantrum, Rebecca made a last minute attempt to keep herself at home. As she reached for her door, rather than her little hand grabbing the handle, instead a chain shot out of her palm and cracked into the wood. The trip to the doctors was cancelled.
